{
    "name": "pune-env-flood-abc",
    "description": "Flood level sensors in Pune city.",
    "label": "Pune Flood Sensors",
    "location": {
        "address": "Pune, Maharashtra",
        "type": "Place"
    },
    "itemStatus": "ACTIVE",
    "dataSampleFile": "https://file.iudx.org.in/iudx/v1/download?file-id=datakaveri.org/04a15c9960ffda227e9546f3f46e629e1fe4132b/rs.iudx.org.in/pune-env-flood/sample.json",
    "resourceServer": "datakaveri.org/f7e044eee8122b5c87dce6e7ad64f3266afa41dc/rs.iudx.io",
    "dataDescriptor": {
        "dataDescriptorLabel": "Data Descriptor for flood-level sensor data in Pune city",
        "currentLevel": {
            "unitText": "meter",
            "description": "Current flooding level indicated by the sensing station corresponding to this observation, computed using referenceLevel and measuredDistance(currentLevel = referenceLevel - measuredDistance).",
            "unitCode": "MTR",
            "type": [
                "ValueDescriptor"
            ],
            "dataSchema": "iudx:Number"
        },
        "description": "Data Descriptor for flood sensor data.",
        "type": [
            "iudx:DataDescriptor",
            "iudx:EnvFlood"
        ],
        "measuredDistance": {
            "unitText": "meter",
            "description": "The distance measured by the sensor, from the sensor tip to the upper surface of water.",
            "unitCode": "MTR",
            "type": [
                "ValueDescriptor"
            ],
            "dataSchema": "iudx:Number"
        },
        "observationDateTime": {
            "description": "Last reported time of observation.",
            "type": [
                "ValueDescriptor"
            ],
            "dataSchema": "iudx:DateTime"
        },
        "referenceLevel": {
            "unitText": "meter",
            "description": "Reference setting used to compute the currentLevel.",
            "unitCode": "MTR",
            "type": [
                "ValueDescriptor"
            ],
            "dataSchema": "iudx:Number"
        },
        "@context": "https://voc.iudx.org.in/"
    },
    "type": [
        "iudx:ResourceGroup",
        "iudx:EnvFlood"
    ],
    "@context": "https://voc.iudx.org.in/",
    "dataSample": {
        "measuredDistance": 3.22,
        "currentLevel": 0.98,
        "observationDateTime": "2020-09-16T13:30:00+05:30",
        "referenceLevel": 4.2
    },
    "provider": "iisc.ac.in/89a36273d77dac4cf38114fca1bbe64392547f86",
    "accessPolicy": "OPEN",
    "resourceType": "MESSAGESTREAM",
    "tags": [
        "flooding",
        "water flooding",
        "flood",
        "flood alert",
        "flood danger",
        "level",
        "river",
        "river bed"
    ],
    "iudxResourceAPIs": [
        "ATTR",
        "TEMPORAL"
    ],
    "instance": "pune",
    "itemCreatedAt": "2021-07-05T12:06:28+0530"
}
